hero.title: Your bus ready when you are
hero.description: Find the bus you need to reach your destination, explore the routes and find the one that best suits your needs.

how-it-works.number2: Click on the bus-stop you are looking for
how-it-works.number3: Get information on stops, schedules, etc.

advantages.title: Advantages of using Chapa Tu Ruta

first.title: Find busses near you
first.description: Easily locate available bus stops in your area without having to ask strangers.

second.title: Forget about misinformation
second.description: All the information organized and validated by the community in one place.

third.title: Avoid walking too much or wasting time
third.description: Get straight to the nearest bus stop with clear and updated routes.

fourth.title: Ideal for new travelers or visitors
fourth.description: Coming from another district or city? ChapaTuRuta guides you step by step.

fifth.title: Made in Peru, designed for you
fifth.description: A tool created by Peruvians who really know how the country moves.

first.question: How much does it cost to use ChapaTuRuta?
first.answer: Nothing! It is completely free for travelers.

second.question: Does it also work for collective cabs or only rural cars?
second.answer: It works for all types of buses that make fixed or semi-fixed routes between districts, cities or towns.

third.question: How can I collaborate to ChapaTuRuta?
third.answer: You can report bugs, upload new stops or routes, or even be a local volunteer - every little bit helps!

fourth.question: What do I do if I can't find a route?
fourth.answer: You can search for nearby routes, try other points, or send us a suggestion from the contact form.

fifth.question: Does ChapaTuRuta work throughout Peru?
fifth.answer: We are growing slowly, but with the help of the community we will be able to expand nationwide in the future.
